short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension accesses Mint.com Cookie data to allow users to import transactions into their account via MintImport.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This easy to use extension allows you to import historical transactions into your Mint.com account. The extension accesses Mint.com Cookie data to establish a connection to the user's Mint.com account. Users are then able to import transactions from a .csv file using the site MintImport.com.

In order to begin importing transactions follow the below steps:
1. Create an account on https://mintimport.com and subscribe to a plan in order to get additional Transaction Credits
2. Log into your Mint.com account
3. Install this Mint Import Extension
4. Once installed, click on this Extension's icon and press the "Connect" button
5. On MintImport.com, click on the "Test" tab to import your first transaction
6. Once you've successfully imported your first transaction, you're ready to do a full import from the .csv template provided on MintImport.com
